https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1d7A66mMtoJ5TQ3UWJn26qUZEhQ.jpg A recent widow is glad when her son finds a new friend. But it soon becomes clear that he's after a different type of companionship. Will their attraction be her undoing? And what secrets is hiding? Cruel Fixation
